body_html:
We will maintain stubs in contrib for a while so importing from the old
location should continue to work. However until the code is moved to core
it is not subject to stability guarantees so it's very possible that the
interfaces change (although I believe the largest changes are behind us).
On Thu, Aug 25, 2016 at 01:49 Hvass-Labs notifications@github.com wrote:

Thanks for the clarification.

Will there be a change in how contrib/layers and contrib/learn will be
imported and used once they're moved to TensorFlow core? If so, when do you
expect to move them to core, so I can wait doing my tutorials until then?

—
You are receiving this because you were assigned.

body:
We will maintain stubs in contrib for a while so importing from the old
location should continue to work. However until the code is moved to core
it is not subject to stability guarantees so it's very possible that the
interfaces change (although I believe the largest changes are behind us).
